languages.text: Осколок К'тан, божество из забытых времен, был порабощен Вольным Торговцем. Эмпиреи над Простором Коронус затревожились — ветер великих перемен коснулся их.
The C'tan Shard, a deity from a forgotten era, was enslaved by the Rogue Trader. The Empyrean above the Koronus Expanse trembled, touched by the winds of great change.
languages.original_text: Осколок К'тан, божество из забытых времен, был порабощен Вольным Торговцем. Эмпиреи над Простором Коронус затревожились — ветер великих перемен коснулся их.

traits.locale_text: C'Tan Shard, a deity of a forgotten era, was enslaved by the Rogue Trader. The Empyrean above the Koronus Expanse trembled, touched by the wind of great change.

The C'tan Shard, a deity from a forgotten era, was enslaved by the Rogue Trader. The Empyrean above the Expanse trembled, touched by the winds of great change.

The C'tan Shard, a deity from a forgotten era, was enslaved by the Rogue Trader. The Empyrean above the Koronus Expanse trembled, touched by the winds of great change.

languages.text: 星神的碎片，来自遗落时代的古老神明，成为了行商浪人的奴隶。伟大的变革之风呼啸着，掠过科罗努斯扩区，就连至高天也为之震颤。
languages.original_text: The C'tan Shard, a deity from a forgotten era, was enslaved by the Rogue Trader. The Empyrean above the Koronus Expanse trembled, touched by the winds of great change.

traits.locale_text: 星神的碎片，来自遗落时代的古老神明，成为了行商浪人的奴隶。伟大的变革之风呼啸着，掠过科罗努斯扩区，就连至高天也为之震颤。

languages.text: Das C'tan-Fragment, eine Gottheit aus einer vergessenen Ära, wurde {mf|vom Freihändler|von der Freihändlerin} versklavt. Das Empyreum über der Koronus-Ausdehnung erzitterte, von den großen Winden des Wandels berührt.
languages.original_text: The C'tan Shard, a deity from a forgotten era, was enslaved by the Rogue Trader. The Empyrean above the Koronus Expanse trembled, touched by the winds of great change.

traits.locale_text: Das C'tan-Fragment, eine Gottheit aus einer vergessenen Ära, wurde {mf|vom Freihändler|von der Freihändlerin} versklavt. Das Empyreum über der Ausdehnung erzitterte, von den großen Winden des Wandels berührt.

languages.text: L'Écharde C'tan, divinité d'une époque oubliée, fut asservie par {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. L'Empyréen au-dessus des Étendues de Koronus frémit, ébranlé par les vents du grand changement.
languages.original_text: The C'tan Shard, a deity from a forgotten era, was enslaved by the Rogue Trader. The Empyrean above the Koronus Expanse trembled, touched by the winds of great change.

traits.locale_text: L'Écharde C'tan, divinité d'une époque oubliée, fut asservie par {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. L'Empyréen au-dessus des Étendues frémit, ébranlé par les vents du grand changement.

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente esclavizó el fragmento de C'tan, una deidad de una era olvidada. El Empíreo de la Extensión de Koronus tembló, azotado por los vientos de un gran cambio.
languages.original_text: The C'tan Shard, a deity from a forgotten era, was enslaved by the Rogue Trader. The Empyrean above the Koronus Expanse trembled, touched by the winds of great change.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente esclavizó el fragmento de C'tan, una deidad de una era olvidada. El Empíreo de la Extensión tembló, azotado por los vientos de un gran cambio.

languages.text: 忘れ去られた時代の神、ク＝タン・シャードは自由開拓者の奴隷となった。コロヌス・エクスパンス上空のエンピリアンは、大きな変化の風に触れ、震えあがった。
languages.original_text: The C'tan Shard, a deity from a forgotten era, was enslaved by the Rogue Trader. The Empyrean above the Koronus Expanse trembled, touched by the winds of great change.

traits.locale_text: 忘れ去られた時代の神、ク＝タン・シャードは自由開拓者の奴隷となった。コロヌス・エクスパンス上空のエンピリアンは、大きな変化の風に触れ、震えあがった。

languages.text: Unutulmuş bir çağda tanrı olan C'tan Parçası, Hür Tacir'in esiri oldu. Büyük bir değişim rüzgârı, Koronus Enginliği'nin semalarındaki Gök Diyar'ı vurup tir tir titredi.
languages.original_text: The C'tan Shard, a deity from a forgotten era, was enslaved by the Rogue Trader. The Empyrean above the Koronus Expanse trembled, touched by the winds of great change.

traits.locale_text: Unutulmuş bir çağa ait bir tanrı olan C'tan Parçası, Hür Tacir tarafından esir alındı. Koronus Enginliği'nin semaları büyük bir değişim rüzgârıyla vurdu ve Gök Diyar tir tir titredi.
